verbose_text: Examination of the effectiveness of the microvesicles purified from the five cell lines in activating mCherry-PAR2 expressed on the surface endothelial cell confirmed a high activity associated with HepG2 and MCF-7-derived microvesicles, with lower levels with MDA-MB-231 microvesicles but no significant PAR2 activation with microvesicles from BxPC-3 or 786-O cells (XREF_FIG).
